page.title: 07Tourism
page.content: Port Talbot has 10 hotels two of which are on the sea front. Near them is the Afan Lido. It has an Olympic-size swimming pool and a sports centre with many activities. We have 5 football pitches, 5 cricket pitches, 10 bowling greens, 30 tennis courts, 2 putting greens and 38 playgrounds. There is a three-mile stretch of sand, but there is oil on parts of the beach and the sea is sometimes polluted. There is a town centre in Station Rd. It has many shops. To the west is a railway station on the main London line. There is a bus station to the north-west. On the sea front there is a car park and a travelling fair visits us twice during the year. We also have two amusement arcades.
